text: Ne ibifune nibiboolela baboolanga mbu; “shikhunyala okhusuubila tawe okhula khuhebwe shinga kalia akahebwa Abarumwa ba Nyasaye.” Nyasaye niye umanyanga habundu wa ara oburume bubwe. Kalinyoola balia abakhola amabii obututuyo obukhongo oburulanga khu –Nyasaye nende eshinyasio eshikhongo khumunyila kwabu kwabakholanga
